actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to permit Charles E. Day, Senior, and Mary Day, husband and wife, to file an action against the United States in the United States District Court for the District of Rhode Island, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits two named individuals to file an action against the United States in a United States District Court for money damages arising out of the death of their son while in the United States Navy.

titles.title: A bill to permit Charles E. Day, Senior, and Mary Day, husband and wife, to file an action against the United States in the United States District Court for the District of Rhode Island, and for other purposes.
